about_the_game:
The Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore Visual Compendium is a comprehensive behind-the-scenes digital art book featuring insight from the development team, exclusive interviews with legacy talent (artist Rob Dunlavey and voice actors Jeffrey Rath and Bonniejean Wilbur), as well as high resolution game and concept artwork.

This digital book is provided as a .PDF file.

VIEWING THE BOOK

  • Locate Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore in your Steam Library
  • Right click the game and highlight "Manage"
  • Select "Browse local files" within the dropdown menu
  • The visual compendium will be present as a .PDF file (Arzette Visual Compendium.pdf)

BONUS: Includes three bonus high-resolution desktop wallpapers! These .jpg files can be found the same way as the visual compendium as described above, named "Arzette Wallpaper 1.jpg", "Arzette Wallpaper 2.jpg", and "Arzette Wallpaper 3.jpg".

This book contains spoilers for Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore. It is best enjoyed after finishing the game.
